description: The cache is located between the Welzheim forest national park andthe Schurwald national park. It is placed near a lookout place nextto the city of Schorndorf.Be sure to check out the lookout bench located very close to thecache at N48¬∞ 47.618', E9¬∞31.508'. Good weather provided, you havea view over most of the Remstal valley. Initial cache contents: US MRE instant food collected from cachePottenstein (peanut butter, apple drink, iced tea), ski strapscollected from cache Hagenholx near Zurich, some tool found on atrack near cache Milumil, a key mapple, an elephant, a pig, afootball, ceramics. Have fun!¬© GeoFaex, Opencaching.de, CC BY-NC-ND, Stand: 07.05.2018;alle Logeintr√§ge ¬© jeweiliger Autor
name: Otti von GeoFaex
